sections.content:
Question:
Is there a development kit suitable for motor control? 
Answer:
RA6T1 has released RSSK (RTK0EMA170S00020BJ) for evaluation and development of motor control applications.
RA6T2 has released a new concept, MCK-RA6T2 (RTK0EMA270S00020BJ).
RA4T1 and RA6T3 are also available MCKs (RTK0EMA430S00020BJ, RTK0EMA330S00020BJ) on the same platform as RA6T2.
With this kit and the sample code that you can download from Renesas website, you can start your motor control evaluation right away. 
Suitable Products
RA6T1, RA6T2, RA4T1, RA6T3
